related_post.text: About brevity: some time ago I wrote this: <https://stackoverflow.com/a/61325612/10295729>. Not sure if it\'s appropriate as an SO answer even with all the warnings but I think it\'s pretty cool (unless you\'re using it in production code!).```py>>> d = {"a": 1 b": 2 c": 3}>>> b a = destructure(d)>>> b2>>> a1```
